snippet: Research in Motion wants programmers to make apps for the BlackBerry PlayBook so badly that it's handing out the tablets for free. Oddly, the PlayBook giveaway could have less to do with the tablet than it does with future BlackBerry smartphones.
abstract: Research in Motion wants programmers to make apps for the BlackBerry PlayBook so badly that it's handing out the tablets for free. Oddly, the PlayBook giveaway could have less to do with the tablet than it does with future BlackBerry smartphones.

headline.main: RIM Offers Programmers Free BlackBerry Tablets for Their Apps
headline.print_headline: RIM Offering Free Tablets To App Makers
